doc.after: Twenty-seven million Germans are members of a sports club and an additional twelve million pursue sports individually.[243] Association football is the most popular sport. With more than 6.3Â million official members, the German Football Association (Deutscher FuÃball-Bund) is the largest sports organisation of its kind worldwide, and the German top league, the Bundesliga, attracts the second highest average attendance of all professional sports leagues in the world.[243] The German men's national football team won the FIFA World Cup in 1954, 1974, 1990, and 2014 and the UEFA European Championship in 1972, 1980 and 1996. Germany hosted the FIFA World Cup in 1974 and 2006 and the UEFA European Championship in 1988.
